title: Configuration of a L2 Port Forwarding pipeline

pipeline.description: name of the pipeline, must be set to portfwd

mac-swap-upstream.description: if set, swap the source MAC address in the packets received from the downlink port before forwarding to the uplink port

mac-swap-downstream.description: if set, swap the source MAC address in the packets received from the uplink port before forwarding to the downlink port
